document_data.mainbody:
Hawksar was a War Wizard of Cormyr in the late 14 century DR.
In Mirtul of the , while grumbling about how difficult it was to hunt down Elminster Aumar, Hawksar was named by the War Wizard Eskrel Starbridge alongside Belandroon and Arbrace as one of the few War Wizards who might well be as competent as they thought themselves to be. All mages present grinned at that.
